net.proteusframework.ui.mcolumn

Class AbstractColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.mcolumn.AbstractColumn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MTableColumn, MTreeColumn
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FixedValueColumn, PropertyColumn

    public abstract class AbstractColumn
extends Object
implements MTreeColumn, MTableColumn
    Convenience implementation of a MTableColumn and MTreeColumn.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • getValue

        public Object getValue(TreePath path)
        Gets the value by calling MTableColumn.getValue(Object) with the last item in the path.
        Specified by:
        getValue in interface MTreeColumn
        Parameters:
        path - the path.
        Returns:
        the value or null if no value is available for the specified path.

      • isValueEditable

        public boolean isValueEditable(Object rowData)
        Return true if the value is editable. Override to implement. Returns false.
        Specified by:
        isValueEditable in interface MTableColumn
        Parameters:
        rowData - the row data.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • isValueEditable

        public boolean isValueEditable(TreePath path)
        This calls isValueEditable(Object) with the last path component. Return true if the path is editable.
        Specified by:
        isValueEditable in interface MTreeColumn
        Parameters:
        path - the path.
        Returns:
        true or false.
